The environmental threats section allows you to [**visualize the degree of overlap of environmental threats**]{.underline}. On a scale from 0 to 1, higher values indicate a higher concentration of threats---[**darker colors indicate more highly impacted areas for the aggregated threats selected**]{.underline}**.**

To customize the map and display overlapping threats of interest, you can toggle between different options.

[**Follow the tour to see what you can do.**]{.underline}
